info.author: Chris AtLee
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
configsaver is a python script that will
synchronize your configuration files using your gmail account.
        
When configsaver detects that there is a difference between the
local and remote copies of a file, it will prompt you if you would
like to upload the local copy, or download the remote copy of the
file.
info.name: configsaver
info.html_description:
configsaver is a python script that will synchronize your configuration files using your gmail account.

When configsaver detects that there is a difference between the local and remote copies of a file, it will prompt you if you would like to upload the local copy, or download the remote copy of the file.
